title: The Most Epic Drone Farm Tour | by Farmer Brad

subtasks: Identify a suitable location for the garden
Prepare the soil by turning and loosening it
Moisten the soil as needed
Select appropriate seeds or seedlings
Align rows or planting spaces in the garden
Insert seeds into the soil at the correct depth
Cover the seeds with soil and pat down gently
Drive the combine harvester onto the field
Start the combine's engines
Adjust the combine's cutting depth and swivel
Begin harvesting crops by moving the combine through the rows
Direct the combine to the next section or storage area
Ensure the combine is functioning properly and adjust as needed
Approach the cow calmly and approach from the rear
Inspect the cow's udder for any abnormalities
Clean the cow's teats with a disinfectant solution
Attach the milking cups to the cow's teats
Start the milking process and monitor the milk flow
Disinfect the teats after milking and remove the cups
Drive a wagon or truck carrying hay to the livestock area
Unload the hay from the vehicle
Spread the hay evenly across the designated feeding area
Observe the livestock's feeding behavior and adjust the amount if necessary

tasks.task: Apply weed killer to a field
subtasks: Choose the appropriate type of weed killer for the field
Mix the weed killer according to the label instructions
Fill a sprayer or apply the weed killer manually
Traverse the field, applying the weed killer evenly
Clean up equipment and dispose of waste properly
